Module extensions.math

Extensions to the Lua standard math library.

Functions

clamp (num, minValue, maxValue) Returns num clamped to [minValue, maxValue].
round (num[, precision]) Returns num rounded normally to precision decimals of precision.
sign (n) Returns -1 for a negative number, 1 for a positive number and 0 for 0.
cbrt (n) Returns the cube root of n.
root (n, base) Returns the baseth root of n.
isnan (n) Returns true if n is nan.

Fields

nan A value that is never equal to itself.
